SELECT /* MRPA0020.SEARCH00 세금계산서가 발행된 전파,CATV 간접광고 목록 조회 */ A.CUST_CODE /*광고주코드*/ , B.CUST_NAME /* 광고주명 */ , A.PRGM_NAME /*프로그램*/ , A.BRND_CODE /*브랜드코드*/ , E.BRND_NAME /*브랜드명*/ , DECODE(A.BROD_MOND,1,'월','')|| /*요일*/ DECODE(A.BROD_TUES,1,'화','')|| DECODE(A.BROD_WEDN,1,'수','')|| DECODE(A.BROD_THUR,1,'목','')|| DECODE(A.BROD_FRID,1,'금','')|| DECODE(A.BROD_SATU,1,'토','')|| DECODE(A.BROD_SUND,1,'일','') AS BROD_DAYY , A.TTST_DATE /*방송시작일*/ , A.TTED_DATE /*방송종료일*/ , A.CONT_FILD /*횟수*/ , A.AMNT_FILD /*매체비*/ , A.BROD_FLAG /*운행구분코드*/ , C.COMM_CDNM AS BROD_FLNM /*운행구분*/ , '간접광고' AS ADDX_TYPE /*광고유형*/ , A.CONT_FORM /*판매시장코드*/ , D.COMM_CDNM AS CONT_FMNM /*판매시장*/ FROM MD_ETMDXM A LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM B ON A.CUST_CODE = B.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN MD_CODEXM C ON A.BROD_FLAG = C.COMM_CODE LEFT JOIN MD_CODEXM D ON A.CONT_FORM = D.COMM_CODE LEFT JOIN MD_BRNDXM E ON A.CUST_CODE = E.CUST_CODE AND A.BRND_CODE = E.BRND_CODE WHERE A.YEAR_MNTH >= #YEAR_MNTH# /* 년월 */ AND A.YEAR_MNTH <= #YEAR_MNTH2# AND (A.PRGM_NAME LIKE 'P-%' OR A.PRGM_NAME LIKE '%가상%' OR A.PRGM_NAME LIKE '%간접%')
A.CUST_CODE = #CUST_CODE# /* 광고주코드 */
A.BRND_CODE = #BRND_CODE# /* 브랜드코드 */
B.CUST_NAME LIKE '%'||#CUST_NAME#||'%' /* 광고주명 */
A.PRGM_NAME LIKE '%'||#PRGM_NAME#||'%' /* 프로그램명 */
UNION ALL SELECT A.CUST_CODE /*광고주코드*/ , B.CUST_NAME /* 광고주명 */ , A.PRGM_NAME /*프로그램*/ , A.BRND_CODE /*브랜드코드*/ , E.BRND_NAME /*브랜드명*/ , DECODE(A.BROD_MOND,1,'월','')|| /*요일*/ DECODE(A.BROD_TUES,1,'화','')|| DECODE(A.BROD_WEDN,1,'수','')|| DECODE(A.BROD_THUR,1,'목','')|| DECODE(A.BROD_FRID,1,'금','')|| DECODE(A.BROD_SATU,1,'토','')|| DECODE(A.BROD_SUND,1,'일','') AS BROD_DAYY , A.TTST_DATE /*방송시작일*/ , A.TTED_DATE /*방송종료일*/ , A.CONT_FILD /*횟수*/ , A.AMNT_FILD /*매체비*/ , A.BROD_FLAG /*운행구분코드*/ , C.COMM_CDNM AS BROD_FLNM /*운행구분*/ , '간접광고' AS ADDX_TYPE /*광고유형*/ , A.CONT_FORM /*판매시장코드*/ , D.COMM_CDNM AS CONT_FMNM /*판매시장*/ FROM MD_CTMDXM A LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM B ON A.CUST_CODE = B.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN MD_CODEXM C ON A.BROD_FLAG = C.COMM_CODE LEFT JOIN MD_CODEXM D ON A.CONT_FORM = D.COMM_CODE LEFT JOIN MD_BRNDXM E ON A.CUST_CODE = E.CUST_CODE AND A.BRND_CODE = E.BRND_CODE WHERE A.YEAR_MNTH >= #YEAR_MNTH# /* 년월 */ AND A.YEAR_MNTH <= #YEAR_MNTH2# AND (A.PRGM_NAME LIKE 'P-%' OR A.PRGM_NAME LIKE '%가상%' OR A.PRGM_NAME LIKE '%간접%')
A.CUST_CODE = #CUST_CODE# /* 광고주코드 */
A.BRND_CODE = #BRND_CODE# /* 브랜드코드 */
B.CUST_NAME LIKE '%'||#CUST_NAME#||'%' /* 광고주명 */
A.PRGM_NAME LIKE '%'||#PRGM_NAME#||'%' /* 프로그램명 */

SELECT /* MRPA0020.SEARCH01 광고주목록 가져오기 */ A.CUST_CODE /* 광고주코드 */ , A.CUST_NAME /* 거래처명 */ , A.CUST_NAME AS CLIENT_NAME /* 거래처명 */ , ' ' AS USEX_CODE /* NULL */ FROM TA_CUSTXM A LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXD B ON A.CUST_CODE = B.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND B.CUCL_CODE = 'FA260110'
